data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Monastir that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Monastir, Tunisia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Monastir, Tunisia to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Monastir, Tunisia, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Monastir, Tunisia to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 548,636 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Amazigh, Siliana people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, fill the 548,800 souls living in the state of Monastir with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Over 99.55 percent of the people of Monastir are far from Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the state of Monastir, Tunisia has a population of 548,800.

We estimate Monastir has 163 people who might know Jesus, 2,300 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 546,336 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3,366 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Monastir, Tunisia.
